message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $13,000 to start. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm really interested in making a deal, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I appreciate you coming back with an offer.  While $9,500 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to be flexible. How about we meet in the middle at $11,250?

I appreciate your willingness to be flexible, but I'm still a bit concerned about the price. How about we try $10,000? I'm willing to make a serious commitment to buying the product if we can meet at this price.
